WCAG Contrast Validation

Testing color contrast ratios across theme skins

Current Theme: - / -

Body Text Contrast

Testing --bs-body-color on --bs-body-bg

Normal text (16px) - This text must meet WCAG AA (4.5:1) and ideally AAA (7:1) contrast ratio against the body background.

Large text (20px) - This text must meet WCAG AA (3:1) and ideally AAA (4.5:1) contrast ratio.

Small text (14px) - Critical for readability, must meet WCAG AA (4.5:1).

Primary Color Contrast

Testing --bs-primary usage

White on Primary

White text on primary background for buttons and badges.

Primary Text

Primary colored text on body background.

Link Contrast

Testing --bs-link-color against body background

Paragraph with link text that must be distinguishable from surrounding body text. Links must have 3:1 contrast against surrounding text AND meet text contrast requirements.

Standalone link text - Must meet WCAG AA for text contrast.

Secondary & Muted Text

Testing secondary color variants

Secondary text color - Used for less prominent content. Must still meet WCAG AA (4.5:1).

Muted text color - Used for hints and captions. Must meet minimum contrast.

Tertiary text color - Lowest emphasis text. Verify readability.
